message.description: Message to log to the console

arguments_schema.title: Log a message to the console

addonUrl.description: URL of the add-on XPI file

arguments_schema.title: Enroll a user in an opt-out SHIELD study

arguments_schema.description: This action shows a single survey.

engagementButtonLabel.description: Text for the engagement button. If specified, this button will be shown instead of rating stars.

includeTelemetryUUID.description: Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry

learnMoreMessage.description: Message to show to the user to learn more

learnMoreUrl.description: URL to show to the user when they click Learn More

message.description: Message to show to the user

postAnswerUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to after rating Firefox or clicking the engagement button

repeatEvery.description: How often (in days) the action is displayed.

repeatOption.description: Determines how often an action executes. (once|nag|xdays)

surveyId.description: Slug uniquely identifying this survey in telemetry

thanksMessage.description: Thanks message to show to the user after they've rated Firefox

arguments_schema.title: Show a Heartbeat survey.

ratio.description: Ratio of users who should be grouped into this branch

slug.description: Unique identifier for this branch of the experiment

value.description: Value to set the preference to for this branch

experimentDocumentUrl.description: URL of a document describing the experiment

preferenceBranchType.descript: Controls whether the default or user value of the preference is modified

preferenceName.description: Full dotted-path of the preference that controls this experiment

preferenceType.description: Data type of the preference that controls this experiment

arguments_schema.title: Run a feature experiment activated by a preference.
